TopicTitle: Pro Props - Wearable items for your kerbals. Updated to KIS!

Articles.Content: Please, do it. I would really like to add collaborators.

I have a bit of an issue where light from spotlights/headlights doesn't affect the mask but does light everything around it, I don't suppose you know if this can be adjusted? I also noticed the end of the stock on the ARifle is missing. This is quite fun to play with, cheers.

that gave me shivers.

I will look what can do.

EDIT:

ok fixed that. also now you can have translucent texture.

another tipe of mask is on the list, and a old 3D glasses too.

New Idea, make a Viking helmet. For Robbaz!

I also tried meshing that helmet and its so wonky cuse the dimensions, yours is better so dont feel bad ! Maybe remove the gass part or using the one from the fullview ghelmet?

Thanks.

Transparency and textures are easy. when finished, the glass will be transparent or translucent.

I have put more work on it. (I feel compelled to finish it.) I am making it by parts, the top is almost done. also I'm discovering tools of Blender that I never used.

The thing is, that I have front, side and back pictures of it, but no top view pics. And the photos I have, all have different measures. When I finish from one side, from the other viewpoint is different.

So I was thinking. If someone have a request of a complicated object, I would prefer a draw of it with orthogonal views.
now I need a red suit with CH in a yellow heart.

Now, this is better.

It is so delightful how it fits.

The file it is Updated, download from the list.

This helmet still beta, (At least I'm not ashamed of it, like the previous version). rest to fix a little the model and use a better texture. Or you post a texture. I would love to see it

Wow, really wow. It looks so nice and clean.

How is the viking Helmet going?
There are 6 on the list before that. The model it isn't hard to do. I guess I could move it up a bit.
Sweet!! Great update on it
So 80's!
how are you going to listen the music without this?

You watched Guardians of the Galaxy.

Would be cool if we find a way to carry/wear multiple parts.

Who doesn't watched it?

May be for christmas or january, when kospy release KIS you will be able to carry many items as you want. and they will be attached to the body parts. not as I faked it.

For now you can edit the config file and attach parts to the kerbals, but the parts become permanents. (at least when I tested it)

btw. the viking helmet is up.
